channel.title: Browser on Sriram S - Innervoice
channel.description: Recent content in Browser on Sriram S - Innervoice

item.title: OpenStack Controller Logs – view using a browser
item.description: OpenStack is made up of various services. These services have their own logs stored under /var/log directory. While working on OpenStack related projects it is quite common to monitor the logs for any problems or errors. While the tail command is the most popular, there are many benefits of using web browser to view the logs. In this blog let us see how we can view OpenStack Controller Logs using a browser.

item.title: 4 Tools for Increasing Productivity
item.description: If you are reading this, you are probably aware of the importance of productivity. In today’s day and age a boost in productivity can help a long way in our personal and professional lives. Better productivity helps us adapt to expectations from a fast changing world. In this blog I share 4 tools that can help you improve your productivity.
